Class NodeUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      com.compendium.ui.plaf.NodeUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class NodeUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

The UI class for the UINode Component

recalculateCaretRectangle

private void recalculateCaretRectangle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                       java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                                       java.awt.Rectangle iconR,
                                       int maxWidth,
                                       boolean isUp)
A helper method for the paint method. Calulate the caretRectangle position when it is moving up or down a row.

Parameters:
g, - the current Graphics context.
fm, - the font metrics to use.
iconR, - the rectangle of the node icon.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the node.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

private void setCaretRectangle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                               java.awt.FontMetrics fm,

                               int caretIndex,
                               java.awt.Rectangle iconR,
                               int maxWidth)

fm, - the font metrics to use.

caretIndex, - the current position of the caret in this row.
iconR, - the rectangle of the node icon.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the node.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

                      UINode node,

                      java.awt.Rectangle textR,
                      java.awt.Rectangle iconR,
                      int maxWidth,
                      int startPos)

g, - the current Graphics context.
fm, - the font metrics to use.
node - com.compendium.ui.UINode, the current node being painted.

iconR, - the rectangle of the node icon.
maxWidth, - the maximum width for the node.
startPos, - the starting position of this row in the context of the while label.
isUp, - is the caret moving up a row? True equals up a row, false equals down a row.

openNode

public void openNode()
Open this node depending on type. If a map/list node, open the view. If the trashbin open the Trashbin dialog. If a reference node, open any associated reference in an external application. If any other node, open the UINodeContentDialog for this node.

findViewFrame

private UIViewFrame findViewFrame()
Find the viewframe for this node. If the node does not know it get the current frame. This should not be necessary but fixes an occassional bug. This method sets the variable 'oViewPane', as well as returning the frame.
